article_title: Stithem caps career at Kearney High as one of school’s all-time greats
article_text:
Shanon Geisler KEARNEY — Shanon M. Geisler, 26, of Kearney died Saturday, May 21, 2016, at CHI Health Good Samaritan.

Christopher Burns MINDEN — Christopher R. Burns, 35, of Kearney died Sunday, May 22, 2016, as the result of an automobile accident in Kearney County.

Jerry West LINCOLN — Jerry D. West, 51, of Lincoln died Saturday, May 21, 2016, in Lincoln.

Michael Ross GIBBON — Michael J. “Mick” Ross, 69, of Gibbon died Saturday, May 21, 2016, at his home.

Lorma Lee Wiebe KEARNEY — Lorma Lee (Kroeker) Wiebe, 78, of Kearney died Monday, May 16, 2016, at her home.

2002 Archived Story: Sluti testifies about long trip full of fear, pain (orig. published 06-12-02) OMAHA - Kidnap victim Anne Sluti of Kearney ran into his arms after she was released, Deputy Lance Ewers of the Lake County Sheriff's Department in Polson, Mont., testified this morning.

Verna Kiburz KEARNEY — Verna Kiburz, 85, of Kearney died Sunday, May 22, 2016, at her home.

Rollie Trautman ALMA — Rollie Lee Trautman, 78, of Alma died Saturday, May 21, 2016, at his home.

Wilma Sorge HOLDREGE — Wilma E. Sorge, 73, of Holdrege, formerly of Imperial, died Tuesday, May 24, 2016, at Phelps Memorial Health Center in Holdrege.

E. Grayce Wiley LEXINGTON — Edna “Grayce” Wiley, 99, of Lexington died Sunday, May 22, 2016, at Plum Creek Healthcare Community.

Klit Brewer KEARNEY — Klit A. Brewer, 66, of Kearney died Friday, May 20, 2016, at CHI Health Good Samaritan.

Patricia Bradford RAVENNA — Patricia M. Bradford, 79, of Loup City died Thursday, May 19, 2016, at Good Samaritan Center in Ravenna.

Susan Maurstad LOVELAND, Colo. — Susan Arlene Maurstad, 62, of Loveland died of cardiac arrest Saturday, May 14, 2016, at her home.

Kay Grone WYMORE — Kay Elizabeth Kohlmeyer Grone, 75, of Wymore, formerly of Kearney, died Thursday, May 12, 2016, at Good Samaritan Center in Wymore.

Agnes Leiphon KEARNEY — Agnes (McKay-Carlson) Leiphon, 94, of Kearney died Sunday, May 22, 2016, at Mount Carmel Home Keens Memorial.

Janice Power HASTINGS — Janice Butin Power, 87, of Kenesaw, formerly of Shelton, died Saturday, May 21, 2016, at Mary Lanning Healthcare in Hastings.

article_metadata.description: KEARNEY — From the seats of Pinnacle Bank Arena, Allison Kruger had seen enough. While taking in the Class A Girls Basketball State Quarterfinals, the Southwest Minnesota State women’s basketball coach believed she’d found her diamond in the rough — a 5-7, two-way guard from central Nebraska. She was intent on making a recruiting pitch.
